The current #Cardano main-net and #Shelley test-net are two separated networks. The state of the main-net will be copied to test-net via snapshot. Thus addresses and $ADA will appear in the test-net. You need to have ADA in Daedalus or Yoroi BEFORE the snapshot.   #blockchain  https://t.co/J2PnioTAgQ

Charles speaks about Shelley test-net and snapshots at the beginning of another AMA.  Of course, there is a lot of interesting information about #Cardano and development. The transparency of the project is so amazing. Cardano standard!   https://t.co/Jz6gEZO5R0  $ADA

Do you know what has #Cardano main-net and Shelley test-net in common?   Seeds. The same SEED you use in Daedalus or YOROI within the main-net will be used to recreate the test-net wallet. Snapshot just copies addresses and #ADA coins. The SEED is the key to test-net ADA.  https://t.co/NmLuetbYOW

Fact❗️#Cardano Incentivized Testnet will begin with a #UTXO snapshot of all #ADA balances held across mainnet. This snapshot will capture the value of your ADA balance at the time. It‘s this snapshot balance that will then be allowed to transferred into the Incentivized Testnet  https://t.co/JrCWKRz9dC
